name: sdks/ccxt/public/Ticker fetcher

f838d7e5-74b5-4245-8630-aa75ce419cb1.name: exchange
f838d7e5-74b5-4245-8630-aa75ce419cb1.description:
Received the exchange to be used.

More:
https://docs.ccxt.com/en/latest/exchange-markets.html

Example:
```
{"id": "aax"}
```

958e1641-dd76-41a7-a436-92290000eb61.name: query
958e1641-dd76-41a7-a436-92290000eb61.description:
Received the ticker parameters to be fetched.

Example:
```
{
  "symbol": "BTC/USDT"
}
```

1b5bfbab-7759-4f93-8905-5d7d5c0c48a6.type:
{
    "symbol": string,
    "info": any,
    optional "timestamp": number, 
    optional "datetime": string,
    optional "high": number, 
    optional "low": number, 
    optional  "bid":  number, 
    optional "bidVolume": number, 
    optional  "ask": number, 
    optional "askVolume": number, 
    optional "vwap": number, 
    optional "open": number, 
    "close": number, 
    "last": number, 
    optional "previousClose": number, 
    optional "change": number, 
    optional "percentage": number, 
    optional "average": number, 
    optional "baseVolume": number, 
    optional "quoteVolume": number 
}
1b5bfbab-7759-4f93-8905-5d7d5c0c48a6.name: data
1b5bfbab-7759-4f93-8905-5d7d5c0c48a6.description:
Sends statistical calculation with the information calculated over the past 24 hours for a specific market.

Example:
```
{
  "symbol": "BTC/USDT",
  "timestamp": 1659105907361,
  "high": 24398,
  "low": 22996.84,
  "open": 22997.99,
  "close": 24103.57,
  "last": 24103.57,
  "change": 1105.58,
  "percentage": 4.807289680532951,
  "average": 23550.78,
  "quoteVolume": 1552289875.7780151,
  "info": {
    "a": "0.00000000",
    "c": "24103.57000000",
    "d": "4.80728968",
    "h": "24398.00000000",
    "l": "22996.84000000",
    "o": "22997.99000000",
    "q": "65051.088090",
    "s": "BTCUSDT",
    "v": "1552289875.77801514",
    "t": 1659105907361
  }
}
```

More:
https://docs.ccxt.com/en/latest/manual.html#price-tickers

description:
Loads statistics for a particular market/symbol for some period of time in recent past, usually last 24 hours.

More:
https://docs.ccxt.com/en/latest/manual.html#price-tickers

Example:
```
1. {"id": "aax"}@0 received via `exchange`
2. {
  "symbol": "BTC/USDT"
}@0 received via `query`
3. {
  "symbol": "BTC/USDT",
  "timestamp": 1659357154942,
  "high": 24207.39,
  "low": 22950.5,
  "open": 23751.54,
  "close": 23246.93,
  "last": 23246.93,
  "change": -504.61,
  "percentage": -2.124535924828453,
  "average": 23499.235,
  "quoteVolume": 912693366.7110586,
  "info": {
    "a": "0.00000000",
    "c": "23246.93000000",
    "d": "-2.12453592",
    "h": "24207.39000000",
    "l": "22950.50000000",
    "o": "23751.54000000",
    "q": "38923.969718",
    "s": "BTCUSDT",
    "v": "912693366.71105862",
    "t": 1659357154942
  }
}@0 sent via `data`
```
